pages.title: Dromedary
pages.text: Males typically weigh between 400 and 690 kg ($(o)880 and 1,520 lb$()), and females weigh between 300 and 540 kg ($(o)660 and 1,190 lb).$(br2)The coat is generally a shade of brown.$(br2)The hump, 20 cm ($(o)7+7⁄8 in$()) tall or more, is made of fat bound together by fibrous tissue.

pages.title: Dromedary
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)2 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cactus$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 13 Days
